attributes.action: Ban the general sales of Fireworks, keep them limited to private displays only
attributes.additional_details:
Every year again more and more injuries are caused by Fireworks.
We have animals in fear, ex and current serving members of the military also.
It wastes a massive amount of time for our emergency services also dealing with incidents that could be lowered dramatically.
As I’m sure you will be aware of that a total of 1,936 people in England needed hospital treatment in 2018-19 because of firework injuries. The victims in 600 cases – almost a third (31%) overall – were aged under 18.
attributes.background: Ban the general sales of fireworks to the public. Limit fireworks to professional displays only.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/319891
